name: dockflare
tagline: A web dashboard for viewing Docker container logs and resource stats
description: DockFlare is a simple web-based UI for managing and monitoring Docker containers. It displays container logs, stats, and actions via an intuitive dashboard suited for homelab users and container enthusiasts.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access container logs through web interface. Easy troubleshooting

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Clean UI designed for homelab users. User-friendly experience

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor CPU, memory, and network usage. Performance insights

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Manage your containers from your own dashboard. Complete control
